name: link-package
description: A package to help resolve npm link dependencies during the Bazel transition. Other packages link to the packages installed in its node_modules directory. Should never be published.

scripts.build: yarn build-link-package-core && yarn build-backend-webgl && yarn build-backend-webgpu && yarn build-converter && yarn build-tflite && yarn build-layers && yarn build-data && yarn reinstall
scripts.reinstall: yarn && yarn reinstall-link-package-core && yarn cache clean @tensorflow/tfjs-backend-webgl && yarn cache clean @tensorflow/tfjs-backend-webgpu && yarn cache clean @tensorflow/tfjs-converter && yarn cache clean @tensorflow/tfjs-tflite && yarn cache clean @tensorflow/tfjs-layers && yarn cache clean @tensorflow/tfjs-data && rimraf node_modules && yarn
